trans-unit.source: Manages serialization of activities into designer-generated source code segments before compilation.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce la serializzazione di attività in segmenti del codice sorgente generato da progettazione prima della compilazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to associate with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> da associare a questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified serialization provider to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il provider di serializzazione specificato al gestore della serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider"></xref> to be added.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider"> </xref> da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> associated with <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"> </xref> associato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use Context to provide information to a nested <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager>.
trans-unit.target: Usare il contesto per fornire informazioni a un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager> annidati

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type and adds it to a collection of named instances.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza del tipo specificato e lo aggiunge a una raccolta di istanze denominate.

trans-unit.source: This provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un riferimento indiretto per la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>metodo con lo stesso nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data <xref:System.Type> to create.
trans-unit.target: I dati <xref:System.Type>da creare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of arguments to pass to the constructor for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>di argomenti da passare al costruttore per il tipo specificato.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The name assigned to the resulting object.
trans-unit.target: Il nome assegnato all'oggetto risultante.

trans-unit.source: This name can be used to access the object later through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetInstance*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo nome può essere utilizzato per accedere all'oggetto in un secondo momento tramite <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetInstance*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetInstance*>

trans-unit.source: If null is passed, the object is created but cannot be accessed by name.
trans-unit.target: Se viene passato null, l'oggetto viene creato ma non è possibile accedere in base al nome.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add the object to the design container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per aggiungere l'oggetto per il contenitore di progettazione. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object must implement <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> for this to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto deve implementare <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> perché abbia effetto.

trans-unit.source: The newly created object instance.
trans-unit.target: Istanza dell'oggetto appena creato.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Object> of the specified name, or null if that <xref:System.Object> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Object>il nome specificato oppure null se <xref:System.Object>non esiste.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un riferimento indiretto per la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>metodo con lo stesso nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Object> to obtain.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref:System.Object>per ottenere.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> of the specified name, or null if that <xref:System.Object> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>il nome specificato oppure null se <xref:System.Object>non esiste.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the specified <xref:System.Object>, or null if the <xref:System.Object> has no name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Object>, o null se il <xref:System.Object>non ha nome.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the object is not an activity the corresponding method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto non è un'attività il metodo corrispondente del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: If the activity has no parent, then the activity qualified ID is returned with any periods (.) replaced by underscores (_).
trans-unit.target: Se l'attività non ha elementi padre, viene restituito l'ID qualificato dell'attività con i punti (.) sostituiti da caratteri di sottolineatura (_).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to obtain the name for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Per ottenere il nome di for</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Una <xref:System.String>che contiene il nome dell'elemento <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a serializer of the requested type for the specified <xref:System.Object> type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un serializzatore del tipo richiesto per l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Object>tipo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the object type is a string, a default serializer is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se il tipo di oggetto è una stringa, viene restituito un serializzatore predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the corresponding method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> is invoked.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario il metodo corrispondente del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>viene richiamato.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.Object> for which to obtain the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>del <xref:System.Object>per il quale ottenere il serializzatore.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of serializer to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>di serializzatore da recuperare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A serializer of the requested type for the specified <xref:System.Object> type.
trans-unit.target: Un serializzatore del tipo richiesto per l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Object>tipo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Object> that provides a service of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Object>che fornisce un servizio specificato <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of service to be provided.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>del servizio deve essere fornito.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that provides a service of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che fornisce un servizio specificato <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Type> of the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Type>il nome specificato.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This version of GetType provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> property of the same name.
trans-unit.target: Questa versione di GetType fornisce un riferimento indiretto per la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>proprietà con lo stesso nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the <xref:System.Type> to load.
trans-unit.target: Il nome completo del <xref:System.Type>da caricare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Type>, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Type> cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref:System.Type>, o un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic) se il <xref:System.Type>non può essere caricato.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains a read-only collection of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> che contiene una raccolta di sola lettura di tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Using the properties available in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> class, you can query Properties about its contents.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando le proprietà disponibili nel <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>(classe), è possibile eseguire query su proprietà informazioni sul suo contenuto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count%2A>proprietà per determinare il numero di elementi nella raccolta.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property to obtain a specific property by index number or by name.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>proprietà da ottenere una proprietà specifica il numero di indice o in base al nome.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to properties, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Find%2A> method to obtain a description of the property that uses the specified name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oltre alle proprietà, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Find%2A>metodo per ottenere una descrizione della proprietà che utilizza il nome specificato dalla raccolta.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains a read-only collection of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> che contiene una raccolta di sola lettura di tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes a custom serialization provider from the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un provider di serializzazione personalizzato dal gestore della serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: `provider` must have been added using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `provider`deve essere stata aggiunta tramite <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: RemoveSerializationProvider provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> property of the same name.
trans-unit.target: RemoveSerializationProvider fornisce un riferimento indiretto per la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>proprietà con lo stesso nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The provider to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il provider da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Reports an error in serialization.
trans-unit.target: Segnala un errore di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: `errorInformation` can be of any object type.
trans-unit.target: `errorInformation`può essere di qualsiasi tipo di oggetto.

trans-unit.source: If the object is an exception, the message of the exception is extracted and reported to the user.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto è un'eccezione, il messaggio dell'eccezione è estratto e riportato all'utente.

trans-unit.source: If the object is any other type, <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to display the information to the user.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto è qualsiasi altro tipo, <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>viene chiamato per visualizzare le informazioni all'utente.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ReportError provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
trans-unit.target: ReportError fornisce un riferimento indiretto per la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>metodo con lo stesso nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the error to report.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che contiene l'errore da riportare.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetName*> cannot locate the specified name in the serialization manager name table.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetName*>non è possibile individuare il nome specificato nella tabella di nome di gestore di serializzazione.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when serialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica al completamento della serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a stack-based, user-defined storage area that is useful for communication between nested serialization objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'area di memorizzazione definita dall'utente basata su stack utile per la comunicazione tra oggetti annidati di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the specified existing <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il nome dell'elemento specificato esistente <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: SetName provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
trans-unit.target: SetName fornisce un riferimento indiretto per la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>metodo con lo stesso nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if you try to rename an existing object or if you try to give a new object a name that is already taken.
trans-unit.target: Se si tenta di rinominare un oggetto esistente o se si tenta di assegnare un nuovo oggetto un nome che è già in uso, viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: In addition, an exception is thrown if you do not pass in an existing object to the method.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, viene generata un'eccezione se non passare un oggetto esistente al metodo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> instance to name.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>istanza al nome.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name to give the instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che contiene il nome da assegnare all'istanza.</xref:System.String>
